reviews.text: This is maybe one of the most famous pilseners but certainly not a good one. It almost has no flavor.
Itâs better than the original Birra Tirana  Pils,  but still holds too many of its bad qulaities.  I am not sure if they are distributing it Albania yet.
better than coors light for the cost.. : 0 the taste is not as watered down as people say and the taste does become sweet as you drink more.can drink six of them easily without feeling filled up
